verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man was sick, <S%G770><s%> named Lazarus, <S%G2976><s%> of Bethany, <S%G963><s%> the town <S%G2968><s%> of Mary <S%G3137><s%> and her sister <S%G79><s%> Martha. <S%G3136><s%>

(It was that Mary <S%G3137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> anointed <S%G218><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> with ointment, <S%G3464><s%> and wiped <S%G1591><s%> his feet <S%G4228><s%> with her hair, <S%G2359><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> was sick. <S%G770><s%>)

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> his sisters <S%G79><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> to him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> behold, <S%G2396><s%> he whom <S%G3739><s%> you love <S%G5368><s%> is sick. <S%G770><s%>

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that, he said, <S%G2036><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> sickness <S%G769><s%> is not to death, <S%G2288><s%> but for the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> might be glorified <S%G1392><s%> thereby. <S%G1223><s%> <S%G846><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> Martha, <S%G3136><s%> and her sister, <S%G79><s%> and Lazarus. <S%G2976><s%>

When <S%G5613><s%> he had heard <S%G191><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that he was sick, <S%G770><s%> he stayed <S%G3306><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> still in the same place <S%G5117><s%> where he was.
Then <S%G1899><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that said <S%G3004><s%> he to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Let us go <S%G71><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%> again. <S%G3825><s%>

His disciples <S%G3101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> to him, Master, <S%G4461><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> of late <S%G3568><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> to stone <S%G3034><s%> you; and go <S%G5217><s%> you thither <S%G1563><s%> again? <S%G3825><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> Are there not twelve <S%G1427><s%> hours <S%G5610><s%> in the day? <S%G2250><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man walk <S%G4043><s%> in the day, <S%G2250><s%> he stumbles <S%G4350><s%> not, because <S%G3754><s%> he sees <S%G991><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world. <S%G2889><s%>
But if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> in the night, <S%G3571><s%> he stumbles, <S%G4350><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> there is no <S%G3756><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> in him.

These <S%G5023><s%> things <S%G5023><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> he: and after <S%G3326><s%> that he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Our friend <S%G5384><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> sleeps; <S%G2837><s%> but I go, <S%G4198><s%> that I may awake <S%G1852><s%> him out of sleep. <S%G1852><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he sleep, <S%G2837><s%> he shall do <S%G4982><s%> well. <S%G4982><s%>
However, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> spoke <S%G2046><s%> of his death: <S%G2288><s%> but they thought <S%G1380><s%> that he had spoken <S%G3004><s%> of taking of rest <S%G2838><s%> in sleep. <S%G5258><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to them plainly, <S%G3954><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> is dead. <S%G599><s%>

And I am glad <S%G5463><s%> for your <S%G5209><s%> sakes that I was not there, <S%G1563><s%> to the intent <S%G2443><s%> you may believe; <S%G4100><s%> nevertheless <S%G235><s%> let us go <S%G71><s%> to him.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> Didymus, <S%G1324><s%> to his fellow disciples, <S%G4827><s%> Let us also <S%G2532><s%> go, <S%G71><s%> that we may die <S%G599><s%> with him.
Then <S%G3767><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> he found <S%G2147><s%> that he had lain in the grave <S%G3419><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> already. <S%G2235><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%> was near <S%G1451><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> about <S%G5618><s%> fifteen <S%G1178><s%> furlongs <S%G4712><s%> off: <S%G575><s%>
And many <S%G4183><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to Martha <S%G3136><s%> and Mary, <S%G3137><s%> to comfort <S%G3888><s%> them concerning <S%G4012><s%> their brother. <S%G80><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Martha, <S%G3136><s%> as soon as she heard <S%G191><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was coming, <S%G2064><s%> went <S%G5221><s%> and met <S%G5221><s%> him: but Mary <S%G3137><s%> sat <S%G2516><s%> still in the house. <S%G3624><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Martha <S%G3136><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you had been <S%G2258><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> my brother <S%G80><s%> had not died. <S%G599><s%>

But I know, <S%G1492><s%> that even <S%G2532><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> whatever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> you will ask <S%G154><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> it you.
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, Your brother <S%G80><s%> shall rise <S%G450><s%> again. <S%G450><s%>

Martha <S%G3136><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, I know <S%G1492><s%> that he shall rise <S%G450><s%> again <S%G450><s%> in the resurrection <S%G386><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to her, I am <S%G1510><s%> the resurrection, <S%G386><s%> and the life: <S%G2222><s%> he that believes <S%G4100><s%> in me, though <S%G2579><s%> he were dead, <S%G599><s%> yet shall he live: <S%G2198><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> lives <S%G2198><s%> and believes <S%G4100><s%> in me shall never <S%G3364><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> die. <S%G599><s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> you this? <S%G5124><s%>

She said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%> I believe <S%G4100><s%> that you are <S%G1488><s%> the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> should come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>

And when she had so <S%G5023><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> she went <S%G565><s%> her way, and called <S%G5455><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> her sister <S%G79><s%> secretly, <S%G2977><s%> saying, <S%G2036><s%> The Master <S%G1320><s%> is come, <S%G3918><s%> and calls <S%G5455><s%> for you.
As soon as she heard <S%G191><s%> that, she arose <S%G1453><s%> quickly, <S%G5035><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to him.

Now <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was not yet <S%G3768><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the town, <S%G2968><s%> but was in that place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Martha <S%G3136><s%> met <S%G5221><s%> him.

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were with her in the house, <S%G3614><s%> and comforted <S%G3888><s%> her, when they saw <S%G1492><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> that she rose <S%G450><s%> up hastily <S%G5030><s%> and went <S%G1831><s%> out, followed <S%G190><s%> her, saying, <S%G3004><s%> She goes <S%G5217><s%> to the grave <S%G3419><s%> to weep <S%G2799><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> was come <S%G2064><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was, and saw <S%G1492><s%> him, she fell <S%G4098><s%> down at <S%G1519><s%> his feet, <S%G4228><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you had been <S%G2258><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> my brother <S%G80><s%> had not died. <S%G599><s%>

When <S%G5613><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> her weeping, <S%G2799><s%> and the Jews <S%G2453><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> weeping <S%G2799><s%> which came <S%G4905><s%> with her, he groaned <S%G1690><s%> in the spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and was troubled. <S%G5015><s%>
And said, <S%G2036><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> have you laid <S%G5087><s%> him? They said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> and see. <S%G1492><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> wept. <S%G1145><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Behold <S%G2396><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he loved <S%G5368><s%> him!

And some <S%G5100><s%> of them said, <S%G2036><s%> Could <S%G1410><s%> not this <S%G3778><s%> man, which <S%G3588><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of the blind, <S%G5185><s%> have caused <S%G4160><s%> that even <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man should not have died? <S%G599><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> groaning <S%G1690><s%> in himself <S%G1438><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> to the grave. <S%G3419><s%> It was a cave, <S%G4693><s%> and a stone <S%G3037><s%> lay <S%G1945><s%> on it.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> Take <S%G142><s%> you away the stone. <S%G3037><s%> Martha, <S%G3136><s%> the sister <S%G79><s%> of him that was dead, <S%G2348><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> by this <S%G2235><s%> time <S%G2235><s%> he stinks: <S%G3605><s%> for he has been <S%G2076><s%> dead four <S%G5066><s%> days. <S%G5066><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, Said <S%G2036><s%> I not to you, that, if <S%G1437><s%> you would believe, <S%G4100><s%> you should see <S%G3700><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> they took <S%G142><s%> away the stone <S%G3037><s%> from the place where <S%G3757><s%> the dead <S%G2348><s%> was laid. <S%G2749><s%> And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> lifted <S%G142><s%> up his eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> I thank <S%G2168><s%> you that you have heard <S%G191><s%> me.

And I knew <S%G1492><s%> that you hear <S%G191><s%> me always: <S%G3842><s%> but because <S%G1223><s%> of the people <S%G3793><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> stand <S%G4026><s%> by I said <S%G2036><s%> it, that they may believe <S%G4100><s%> that you have sent <S%G649><s%> me.
And when he thus <S%G5023><s%> had spoken, <S%G2036><s%> he cried <S%G2905><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> Lazarus, <S%G2976><s%> come <S%G1204><s%> forth. <S%G1854><s%>

And he that was dead <S%G2348><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> and foot <S%G4228><s%> with grave clothes: <S%G2750><s%> and his face <S%G3799><s%> was bound <S%G4019><s%> about <S%G4019><s%> with a napkin. <S%G4676><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Loose <S%G3089><s%> him, and let <S%G863><s%> him go. <S%G5217><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to Mary, <S%G3137><s%> and had seen <S%G2300><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him.
But some <S%G5100><s%> of them went <S%G565><s%> their ways to the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> and told <S%G2036><s%> them what <S%G3739><s%> things Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had done. <S%G4160><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> gathered <S%G4863><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> a council, <S%G4892><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> we? for this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G444><s%> does <S%G4160><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> miracles. <S%G4592><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> we let <S%G863><s%> him thus <S%G3779><s%> alone, <S%G863><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men will believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him: and the Romans <S%G4514><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> and take <S%G142><s%> away both <S%G2532><s%> our place <S%G5117><s%> and nation. <S%G1484><s%>

And one <S%G1520><s%> of them, named Caiaphas, <S%G2533><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> that same <S%G1565><s%> year, <S%G1763><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, You know <S%G1492><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> at <S%G3762><s%> all, <S%G3762><s%>

Nor <S%G3761><s%> consider <S%G1260><s%> that it is expedient <S%G4851><s%> for us, that one <S%G1520><s%> man <S%G444><s%> should die <S%G599><s%> for the people, <S%G2992><s%> and that the whole <S%G3650><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> not.

And this <S%G5124><s%> spoke <S%G2036><s%> he not of himself: <S%G1438><s%> but being <S%G5607><s%> high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> that year, <S%G1763><s%> he prophesied <S%G4395><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> should <S%G3195><s%> die <S%G599><s%> for that nation; <S%G1484><s%>

And not for that nation <S%G1484><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but that also <S%G2532><s%> he should gather <S%G4863><s%> together <S%G4863><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> that were scattered <S%G1287><s%> abroad. <S%G1287><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> from that day <S%G2250><s%> forth they took <S%G1011><s%> counsel <S%G1011><s%> together <S%G1011><s%> for to put <S%G615><s%> him to death. <S%G615><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> walked <S%G4043><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> openly <S%G3954><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Jews; <S%G2453><s%> but went <S%G565><s%> there <S%G1564><s%> to a country <S%G5561><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> to the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a city <S%G4172><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Ephraim, <S%G2187><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> continued <S%G1304><s%> with his disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

And the Jews' <S%G2453><s%> passover <S%G3957><s%> was near <S%G1451><s%> at <S%G1451><s%> hand: and many <S%G4183><s%> went <S%G305><s%> out of the country <S%G5561><s%> up to Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the passover, <S%G3957><s%> to purify <S%G48><s%> themselves. <S%G1438><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> they for Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and spoke <S%G3004><s%> among <S%G3326><s%> themselves, <S%G240><s%> as they stood <S%G2476><s%> in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> you, that he will not come <S%G2064><s%> to the feast? <S%G1859><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> had given <S%G1325><s%> a commandment, <S%G1785><s%> that, if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man knew <S%G1097><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> he were, he should show <S%G3377><s%> it, that they might take <S%G4084><s%> him.
